abstract: Merck and Sanofi-Aventis, two of the world’s biggest pharmaceutical companies, said Tuesday they are uniting their animal health businesses in a deal to lead in the veterinary industry, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Merck and Sanofi-Aventis, two of the world’s biggest pharmaceutical companies, said Tuesday they are uniting their animal health businesses in a deal to lead in the veterinary industry, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Two of the world’s biggest pharmaceutical companies said Tuesday they are uniting their animal health businesses in a deal to become the top dog in the veterinary industry, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Sanofi and Merck Announce Animal Health Venture
